resources.string: Tap a category below to explore how the Samsung Galaxy\nsmartphone unlocks a whole new world of possibilities.
With your compatible Galaxy smartphone,\nexperience a whole new reality that takes your\nentertainment to the next level.

Now you can explore a whole new reality.
Capture some of the best times of your life with Gear
360 and relive the moments through your Gear VR and
compatible Samsung Galaxy smartphone.
With a Samsung phone and compatible Samsung TV,\nyou have more ways to share screens and\nmaximize your entertainment.

Samsung has completely redesigned its Smart TV
experience. With an new intuitive menu, enhanced
recommendations and the ability to share screens
between select Samsung devices, your TV
is now a whole lot smarter.

Samsung Pay on your Samsung Galaxy phone lets you
securely pay just about anywhere with a quick tap or
swipe. And with Samsung Pay, you can even use your
smartwatch to pay on NFC-enabled payment systems.

Introducing Samsung Pay, the new way to pay with
your Samsung Galaxy smartphone. It's simple and secure.
And Samsung Pay on your Samsung smartwatch lets you
pay on NFC-enabled payment systems.
Pair your Samsung phone with SmartThings\nto easily secure, control and monitor\nthe whole house from your phone.
Smart Home. Intelligent Living. SmartThings lets\nyou easily monitor, control, and secure your\nhome from anywhere.

See how simple and easy it is to transfer documents
and files, watch your favorite entertainment, and
manage your communications between your
Samsung Galaxy phone and Samsung Galaxy tablet.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing,\nsed do eiusmed tempor incididunt elit ipsum.
With a Samsung Galaxy smartphone and Samsung\nsmartwatch, you stay connected with calls, emails\nand notification - all on your wrist.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing,\nsed do eiusmed tempor incididunt elit ipsum.

©2016 Samsung Electronics America, Inc. Samsung, Samsung Galaxy S, Super AMOLED, Samsung Pay, Samsung Smart Switch, Samsung Gear and Samsung+ are all trademarks of Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. Use only in accordance with law. Other company and product names mentioned may be trademarks of their respective owners. Screen images simulated; actual appearance of devices may vary. Sequences shortened. Dust and water-resistant based on IP68 rating, which tests submersion in up to 5 feet of water for up to 30 minutes. Fast Charging requires an AFC-compatible charger to work. Wireless phone charging pad sold separately. Battery power consumption depends on factors such as network configuration, carrier network, signal strength, operating temperature, features selected, vibrate mode, backlight settings, browser use, frequency of calls, and voice, data and other application-usage patterns. Portion of memory occupied by existing content. Memory card sold separately. Memory may be expanded up to 2TB. Gear VR: Read and follow warnings and instructions with the Headset before use. The Headset should be calibrated before each use. Not for use by children under 13. A virtual reality experience may trigger health reactions. See a doctor before use if you have a history of seizures. Stop use if you experience health reactions. Gear S2: Sold separately. Gear S2 is compatible with select devices using Android 4.4 and later with at least 1.5GB RAM. Supported devices may vary by carrier and device. Some features may not be available. For best results, connect with compatible Samsung Galaxy devices. Samsung Pay: Samsung Pay is only compatible with select cards, carriers and Samsung devices; see Samsung Pay Support (http://www.samsung.com/Pay) for compatibility information. Smart Switch: Visit www.samsungsmartswitch.com for a list of compatible systems, platforms, devices and terms of use. Certain content (such as DRM-protected content) may not be compatible. Consult any applicable terms and conditions with your content providers to ensure that you have rights to transfer content off your previous device. App matching and recommendation system not available on all devices. Samsung+ app is available via Galaxy Essentials.

© 2016 Samsung Electronics America, Inc. Samsung, Samsung Galaxy S and Gear VR, are all trademarks of Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. Use only in accordance with law. Other company and product names mentioned may be trademarks of their respective owners. Screen images simulated; actual appearance of devices may vary. Sequences shortened. Gear VR and Gear 360 sold separately. Gear VR: Read and follow warnings and instructions with the Headset before use. The Headset should be calibrated before each use. Not for use by children under 13. A virtual reality experience may trigger health reactions. See a doctor before use if you have a history of seizures. Stop use if you experience health reactions. Compatible with select Samsung Galaxy devices.

© 2016 Samsung Electronics America, Inc. Samsung, Galaxy S and Quick Connect are all trademarks of Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. Use only in accordance with law. Other company and product names mentioned may be trademarks of their respective owners. Screen images simulated; actual appearance of devices may vary. Sequences shortened. Internet connection required for streaming, games and apps. Quick Connect: One-step activation after initial setup requires device and TV to be on the same network. Currently available on Galaxy S6/S6 edge and select devices after firmware updates. Quick Connect is compatible with 2015 and later Samsung Smart TVs. For more information, visit http://www.samsung.com/us/experience/smart-tv/.

Some features may not be available. For best results, connect with compatible Samsung Galaxy devices.
